1.0.name: wordpress/willingness
1.0.description: Willingness is lightweight, adaptable and responsive three column layout theme with four optional footer widget areas that looks good on any device. Highly flexible for any type of content or layout. Also ideal for showcasing your multimedia works consisting of images, photo galleries, videos and podcasts. Primarily three column layout, but can be changed to two column, or even a single column layout theme as per your need. Make it yours with a custom menu, header image, and background.
